attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
IDX information is provided exclusively for personal, non-commercial use, and may not be used for any purpose other than to identify prospective properties consumers may be interested in purchasing.

The listing broker’s offer of compensation is made only to participants of the MLS where the listing is filed.

attributionInfo.brokerName: Realty One Group Lock and Key

data.description: Ready for you to move-in, this charming three-bedroom home is located in a wonderful neighborhood. The kitchen boasts granite counter-tops, and includes a gas range with a refrigerator, washer and dryer that stays with home. This all-brick house offers beautiful hardwood floors throughout, with the option to create a fourth bedroom out of one of the two living areas. The entire house has new windows installed as of 2022. Come and see your new home, agents please see remarks.
